name: Memorex (Sparkolo, Marco Romoli)
description:
Follow Rex in his fantasy world, as he relieves his childhood memories related to his Japanese father who just sent him a Shamisen as a present.

Memorex is a very simple walking simulator game, the main focus of which is just to guide the player to a teenager's fantasies in a chill and relaxed mood. Just walk around Rex's dreamy world and explore it slowly. Let the shamisen's sounds guide you and step on the stones to piece together all of Rex's memories.

Note: best played with headphones on!

Controls

Memorex supports both keyboards and game controllers. Controllers are to be preferred to achieve the smoothest experience.

  • WASD / Left Stick: Move Rex
  • ESC / Start (Xbox One): Quit game
  • Any other key: Dismiss dialogues/letters (when prompted)
